p: ICA revealed that the region of harvest did not have a significant impact on O. ehrenbergii EO chemical composition. Carvacrol was the main compound identified in the samples collected at Qartaba and Aabadiye, determining the carvacrol chemotype in these two locations. Figure 8 represents the proportions on the IC1/IC2 plane, Figure 9 shows the source signal of IC1, and Figure 10 shows the source signal of IC2.
